'Caterpillar Inc.', is an American corporation which designs, manufactures,
markets and sells machinery and engines and sells financial products and
insurance to customers via a worldwide dealer network. {{cite web
| url =http://www.cat.com/about-cat title =Caterpillar â About Cat year =2010
| work =cat.com publisher =Caterpillar Inc archiveurl
| =http://www.webcitation.org/5o9n5nlXT archivedate =2010-03-11 accessdate =2010-03-
| 11 quote =We deliver products, services and technologies in three principal
| lines of business: Machinery, Engines and Financial Products.
}} Caterpillar is the world's leading
manufacturer of construction and mining equipment, diesel and natural gas
engines, industrial gas turbines and diesel-electric locomotives. With more than US$70 billion in assets, Caterpillar was ranked number one
in its industry and number 44 overall in the 2009 Fortune 500. {{Cite news
| url =http://money.cnn.com/magazines/fortune/fortune500/2009/snapshots/81.html
| title =Fortune 500 2009: Top 100 American Companies â Caterpillar â CAT first
| =Jia Lynn last =Yang date =2009-05-04 work =FORTUNE on CNNMoney.com publisher
| =Cable News Network, Inc archiveurl =http://www.webcitation.org/5o9yKYxus
| archivedate =2010-03-11 accessdate =2010-03-11 quote =Rank: 44
}}

Caterpillar stock is a component of the Dow Jones Industrial Average. {{cite
web |url =http://www.djaverages.com/index.cfm?view=industrial&page=components
|title =Dow Jones Averages â Dow Jones Industrial Average â Components |year
=2010 |work =djaverages.com |publisher =Dow Jones & Company |accessdate =2010-03-
11 |quote =Ticker CAT â Company Name Caterpillar Incorporated }}
Caterpillar Inc. traces its origins to the 1925 merger of the Holt Manufacturing
Company and the C. L. Best Tractor Company, creating a new entity, the
California based Caterpillar Tractor Company. {{cite web
| url = http://www.library.hbs.edu/hc/lehman/chrono.html?company=caterpillar_tr-
| actor_co title = Caterpillar Tractor Co. List of Deals year = 2010 work =
| Lehman Brothers Collection publisher = President and Fellows of Harvard
| College archiveurl = http://www.webcitation.org/5u2jB9nzf archivedate = 2010-11-
| 06 accessdate = 2010-11-06 quote = In 1925 Holt and C.W. Best's company merged
| to form the Caterpillar Tractor Company.
}} In 1986, the company re-organized itself as a Delaware corporation
under the current name, Caterpillar Inc. Caterpillar's headquarters are located
in Peoria, Illinois, United States.

Caterpillar machinery is recognizable by its trademark "Caterpillar Yellow"
livery and the "CAT" logo. {{cite web
| url =http://www.cat.com/cda/layout?m=37321&x=7 title =Caterpillar â Legal
| Notices year =2010 work =cat.com publisher =Caterpillar Inc archiveurl
| =http://www.webcitation.org/5o9o5qhpO archivedate =2010-03-11 accessdate =2010-03-
| 11 quote ="Caterpillar Yellow,"...trade dress...are trademarks of
| Caterpillar...
}}
